form.privacy: The requested personal data will be processed by Learning Corner School in order to attend to your request and keep you informed about our courses and activities. The legal basis for this processing is your consent, which you may withdraw at any time. You can exercise your rights of access, rectification, deletion, opposition, limitation and portability by email to info@learningcornerschool.com.
form.privacy_link: More information in our Privacy Policy
form.required: * Required fields. We will contact you within the next 24 hours.

cookies.message: We use our own and third-party cookies to improve our services, prepare statistical information and analyze your browsing habits. You can accept all cookies by clicking "Accept" or configure them in "Configure cookies".

testimonials.title: What our students say
testimonials.subtitle: Real testimonials from our community
testimonials.description: Discover how we have helped thousands of people achieve their linguistic and professional goals.

cta.title: Do you want to be the next to achieve your goals?
cta.description: Join thousands of students who have already transformed their future with us

sebastian.text: Dianne is an excellent teacher and with her I am learning the French language very well. She has a good method and a lot of patience with me. The classes are short and enjoyable.

daniel.text: We have our son there. He has improved tremendously since before he always failed the subject and now it's one of the best grades he gets. He loves the way of teaching and is very happy as we are.

diana.text: My experience is positive. No longer being of student age, I have started a language that will serve me at work. I value learning with native teachers who pay attention to pronunciation. The schedule options and location have been a plus.

veronica.text: The teachers adapt completely to each student's level and personalize the classes. The treatment is very kind and close, any problem they know how to help you.

yolanda.text: I am delighted with the academy, my two children take both English and French classes and they are doing great. The classes are very enjoyable. I recommend it 100%.

rocio.text: Great Academy, very personalized classes with small groups of students which is the way to learn and practice languages. The English teacher is a 10!!!! And the French teacher another 10. The education and kindness they transmit is a 10. Students who want to advance in a language, this is the ideal place.
